titleStmt.title: A Diary of the siege and surrender of Lymerick with the articles at large, both civil and military.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Thornton and are to be sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: "The civil articles of Lymerick" and "The military articles of Lymerick" have special t.p.s and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
